ExploreFact.Text: The museum has an alien plate on display. While it doesn't seem to be Nomai in origin, its creator is unknown.

The plate has a map of two solar systems carved on it. One is our system, but the other is a nearby system, Hearth's Neighbor. With a warp drive in one's ship, one could warp to that system and check it out.
The plate was left by the sole survivor of Hearth's Neighbor's inhabitants. They had crashed onto our planet and lived here until the end of their days.
